long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the user there list of faceboook interest. This can be useful to find what interest you may want to remove by doing a quick search after copying the list into a spreadsheet. By removing an interest from the list in facebook the user will no longer see advertisments targeting the interest that they removed. Depending on how the user in interacting with ads and organic content in facebook the interest could be added to their list again in the future. The extension also uploads the list to a server where a record is kept of the interest list as well as basic demographic information that the user enters manually. The user agrees to submitting their interest when they click on the submit button.
